channel.title: Jeep Modification Manual - Acceleration with a Button
channel.description:
Here is a link to an Instructables manual detailing how to modify a Best Choice Products Jeep. The manual was written by FIRST Robotics Team 1939 and describes how to convert the accelerator from a pedal to a button.
Here is the link: https://www.instructables.com/id/Jeep-Modification-Acceleration-With-a-Button/

item.title: Jeep Modification Manual - Acceleration with a Button
item.dc:creator: Rscholl
item.description:
What kind of harness was used for the second seating option? TIA

Read full topic
item.source: Jeep Modification Manual - Acceleration with a Button

item.title: Jeep Modification Manual - Acceleration with a Button
item.dc:creator: caverlyj
item.description:
Do you think it would be possible to use your Jeep manual to modify the Aksum 12 volt Jeep? We are hoping to use the Aksum jeep, but really need to be able to follow a manual. Any suggestions? Thank you so much!

Read full topic
